name: CURSE BREAKER: FALL EDITION
description:
CURSE BREAKER is a breakout clone that is equally as meditative as it is rage-inducing. There are ten levels to smash through with randomized elements for replayability. The fall edition features a spectacular soundtrack and spooky handcrafted pixel art inspired by the autumn season.

You control the ghost of a soul doomed with the task of breaking every single cursed brick that was placed by the corrupted generations that came before. With a jack o' lantern as your vessel, you are able to shift the platform using ethereal magic and shatter these cursed bricks with four orbs. If successful, you will finally be liberated from the curses and find hope in the possibility of a less grim tomorrow.

Download the free demo today to play the fifth level and experience a portion of the darksynth / metal soundtrack!

C O N T R O L S

Arrow Keys = Movement

Spacebar = Begin

R = Restart Level

Escape = Quit

C R E D I T S

Created by VOMITINGMOOSE for the Crunchless Challenge

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Created with GameMaker Studio 2 and Audacity
